tags: like i know it isn’t huge
summary: So I got to see Captain Marvel yesterday and as I was leaving the theatre I saw total at least 20-30+ teenage boys leaving after...
body: So I got to see Captain Marvel yesterday and as I was leaving the theatre I saw total at least 20-30+ teenage boys leaving after me, talking about the movie in a good way, and I just wanna acknowledge them all supporting the movie??? Like I’ve just seen all the posts about all these males hating on the movie but I wanna shoutout all the guys supporting it too??

reblog.comment: So I got to see Captain Marvel yesterday and as I was leaving the theatre I saw total at least 20-30+ teenage boys leaving after me, talking about the movie in a good way, and I just wanna acknowledge them all supporting the movie??? summary: Captain Marvel (Dir Anna Boden & Ryan Fleck, 2h 4m)
title: Captain Marvel (Dir Anna Boden & Ryan Fleck, 2h 4m)
excerpt: CaptainMarvel is a heroine, and a film, for a time where girls and women need a hero of their own.

body:
Perfect

Summary: Bucky’s life is almost perfect. A flat in the centre of the city, a beautiful girlfriend who lives with him and a cat. One night he talks to her.

Paring: Bucky Barnes x Reader

Warnings: Fluff, maybe?

A/N: this is just because I wanted some fluff. Maybe there are some mistakes, forgive me. English is not my native lenguage.

Bucky realized that things were changing when he found a cat in the house. No, maybe earlier, when he realized he had a house. A place to come back in the evening, to go around in your pajamas and relax. A place where all his objects were piled up.

Now everything seemed to be perfect.

He had a flat in the center of the city, a beautiful girlfriend he adored and with he had been together for ten months and who had lived with him for four. He had even cut his hair at some point, forced by the same Y/N, according to her too long and always ruffled.

All of a sudden, he had settled down and he had a life that seemed normal. He had begun to feel like any other person, he was even considering learning a trade as his titles would not have been credible. Or valid.

“Should I go and learn a trade according to you?” he asked, lying on the bed with his arms crossed behind his head, watching as you tried to change your clothes and put them on the chair without waking the cat. You advanced with only your shirt on and sat on the edge of the bed, with one knee on the mattress and face facing the soldier.

“Or you can be a butcher. What would you have done if you didn’t go in war?” You said smiling and lying next to him. Rest your head on his shoulder and he hugged you gently.

Bucky was really happy, all of his life had suddenly become perfect. If they had told him that he would be there, talking about common things by cuddling his girlfriend, he would never have believed it.

“Architect.” he answered quickly, without even thinking about it “I would have made the architect, built palaces and drawn floor plans. I would have liked, I always thought it was fascinating to know how the buildings were built.” What do you think, Y/N? “ He concluded by placing a kiss on your hair.

"There are courses, some night schools that you can attend, of course you would be a little out of the way in a hundred years. I was going to say you could enlist in the army, but maybe that’s enough for this life.” Joking, getting up and sitting down on the bed. You tried to continue your work and take your pajamas.

“We could even go and live in the country and live hunting and gathering if that’s the case, do you see us around the fields picking fruit, Doll?” Bucky said, laughing and rolling your eyes. You didn’t answer.

“You’re the most important person in my life, do you know that?” he asked, looking at you as you returned to him, his head on his shoulder and you in his arms. It was your safe place, you knew nobody would ever hurt you when he was there to protect you.

“I know, you tell me every night.” You answered closing your eyes and letting you go. Bucky turned off the light and hugged you. “I love you.” you whispered.

“I love you too, Y / N. Thank you for everything.”

body:
I hate myself

That moment when you were so excited about Captain Marvel that you *secretly* took a video of the credit scene and sent it to all of your friends without realising that you spoiled everything.

Steve looked like a snack tho

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Domestic Snippets of Life
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2J2tJIA

by Banashee

Some fluff and domestic snippets from the Avengers Tower, mostly centering Clint and Phil.
This was mainly an excuse for me to use some of my headcanons and little ideas that float around my brain.

Words: 2009, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, Hawkeye (Comics)
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen, M/M
  • Characters: Clint Barton, Phil Coulson, Tony Stark, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Bruce Banner, Thor (Marvel), Steve Rogers
  • Relationships: Clint Barton/Phil Coulson
  • Additional Tags: Team as Family, Domestic Fluff, Tony Starks Coffe Machine with too much personality, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Swearing


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2J2tJIA

summary:
So I took my mom to see Captain marvel (as any good son should)  and here are our thoughts:
Her commentary: Great movie. Great...
body:
So I took my mom to see Captain marvel (as any good son should) and here are our thoughts:

Her commentary: Great movie. Great cast. Great characters. Love that it’s a movie with a female superhero

My commentary: Awesome movie, pure kino. I for one welcome our superpowered space goddess.

reblog.comment:

tags: seriously though i want brie larson to marry me that woman is so beautiful omychrist
summary: Hi so, Captain Marvel freaking slaps it's so good, everything about it is great go watch this movie. Carol and Marie are the...
body: Hi so, Captain Marvel freaking slaps it’s so good, everything about it is great go watch this movie. Carol and Marie are the women I wish I had as role models growing up. Their friendship is so sweet and pure and powerful. The most Carol is ever undressed is when she doesn’t have her boots on. There’s no romance (all though I mean couldn’t Marie and Carol be girlfriends like sis come on they love each other so much.) Yall this movie is everything and more. I am in love with one Captain and their name is Carol.

blog.name: loveandsupportforcaptainmarvel
blog.title: Captain Marvel Doesn't Care For Your Sexism
blog.description: Blog dedicated to standing up to the hate directed at Captain Marvel

summary: Just this past weekend I’ve gotten so many more followers and notes on my posts! It makes me so happy to see how many people...
body: Just this past weekend I’ve gotten so many more followers and notes on my posts! It makes me so happy to see how many people love Captain Marvel and support the things I’m saying on my blog! Thank you everyone who follows me or reblogs or likes my posts, it means so much to me to know that what I say has an affect on people.
